title: 30 People Who Completely Changed Their Lives Share What The Experience Was Actually Like
description: "I was 18. The family was out. I put a note on my bed saying “I’m leaving. I’ll be ok” and left. That was 50 years ago. I’m super glad I did it."
content: A lot of us get stuck in life. Either in jobs, relationships, just just bad habits. It’s easy to just accept that as your reality and stay put, but some people manage to completely change their lives… [+24068 chars]
